title: Exciting Flower Viewing Party!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>The flower viewing party is almost here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah, Maru can’t wait zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>We’ve all been saying how super cold it is, but looking back, it felt like Spring came so suddenly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>But the wind on the beach is still cold zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ahaha, you’re right! Training on the beach is still really tough!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hey, Chika-chan, have you prepared the snacks for the flower viewing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’m going to bring looots of oranges!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>What should Maru bring....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>How about a bunch of noppo bread? There are lots of different kinds, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah, let’s do that! Maru wants everyone to have my favorite food too zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
